backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing hero portrait–related features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH color variables and global styling for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Main page composition rendering navigation, all sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Nav/StickyNav.ts: Sticky navigation bar with scroll detection and smooth anchor scrolling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Background section describing teaching experience and tech exploration with fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section displaying email and phone with minimal styling and fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background texture, personal mark, portrait image, headline, tagline, and CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Skills grid listing five skill areas with icons and reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/VisionS: Vision section outlining educational philosophy and interest in technology with reveal animations.
frontend/src/config/heroPortrait.ts: Exports path to the cropped hero portrait asset used in the Hero section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFadeInOnView.ts: Uses an IntersectionObserver to add a staggered fade-in class to child elements when the referenced element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMailtoComposer.ts: Generates and navigates to a mailto URL with optional subject and body parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, fonts, and custom animations for a luxury‑minimal theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, goals, constraints, and design guidelines for the personal website.
